i loved it beautifully drawn background with a good story a nice overall story with a good ending in my opinion also one of the best in the genre classic pointclick it is recommended to play through the series at least once

enjoyed playing this game  not as long as the previous games  the hint system was great as i had problems finding some of the required items  humor was also quite good  i am going to miss the series  had some initial issues running the game on linux  had to add dx9 drivers using proton tricks  once i got it working it ran flawlessly
fun ending to a fun series recommended for pnc fans

looks great sounds great plays great  which is a shocker considering that this 3rd entry in a trilogy follows 2 turds the reason why it took me years to install it with very low expectations quite entertaining i recommend that you play it yet skip the first 2 it wont hurt the narrative anyway as there are enough flashbacks to fill you in

great game i would have loved if the characters were given more control of choices and abilities to perform certain actions that would alter the outcomes and following scenarios overall though i enjoyed this og adventure pc game i will likely purchase the series i started with this one thinking the reviews on the other games in this series would most likely make for unwanted future purchases from this series but i was highly mistaken
another great game in the runaway series

clearly one of the most clever and funniest point and click games i have ever played
best game in the series and best performans on modern computers

exemplary adventure overall best of the series  unfortunately also the last recommend

the best written part of this game is the hilarious help system this is one game that rewards you for cheeting once or twice a chapter with the more uniquely created and funniest hint system i have seen yet there is also some humor in the game itself but maybe its funnier in the original spannish buy this on sale or if you have extra money

its a fun game good voice acting also you play with two different characters in each chapter also the chapters are very interconnected only the later part of the story was a bit overdone still an enjoyable point and click game

best episode of the runaway series the bubblegum of the trilogy a golden chicken material and a must play for all fans of point and click adventure games

since i wrote a negative review for runaway a road adventure i should probably balance it out with my positive review for this installment a huge improvement from the 1st game i havent played the second but compared to the first much more likable characters game feels less like a chore i really enjoyed this one as a lot of people have said a complete turn around

great mechanics enjoyable all around awesome hint system an ingame phone helpline that made getting hints actually fun not that you really should need many as most puzzles were very easy many of the extra dialogue choices were funny and totally worth taking your time to go through best mime portrayal ive seen in a game nice also to play as gina

overall a really good story line and approach  this is the fist of the runaway games ive played so im not certain how it compares to prior games i only know that im buying the remainder of them based on this experience  the puzzles were mostly straight forward with a few twists that took a while to figure out  the characters and video cuts were enjoyable some dry humor infused for a chuckle as well  if you enjoy click and solve mysteries you will enjoy this game

great game if you can finish it but it keeps crashing at the same point in chapter 4 where the dialogue keeps repeating itself over and over and i have to either start from the beginning or my last save point at the start of chapter 2 even though when i choose my profile at the start it says chapter 4 next to my name yet it wont let me load to that point  a fix to this error would make this game something that i could recommend
silly combinations a lack of humor or interesting story this is one of the weaker click everywhere games ive played
acts like you have a choice to change things but there is only one real way to choose if you want to progress  i may play through it for fun but its nothing like the trailer made it out to be

fantastic serie just finished the whole 3 games reminded me a lot of the old point and click adventures such as broken sword and monkey island which are some of my favorite games bit of action mixed with a nice hilarious humor

finally you also get to play gina which fleshes out her character considerably the previous two games have almost no characeterization of her it patches up all the plot holes from the previous game and the story is pretty welltold the new hintsystem in this game is pretty nice and comes in handy several times since puzzles arent always exactly obvious all in all the best game in the series

i think its the easiest of the trilogy the new hot spot system makes sure you dont miss anything in a room if you really stuck there is a clue system inside the game which gives clues as simple riddles so that you dont feel too bad for seeking help the game looks very nice the plot is not what youd expect after runaway 2 but i enjoyed it nonetheless
excellent animationvisuals and great voice acting  endearing characters with funny dialog really colors this game and makes the experience a lot of fun
not bad at all much easier thant the firts two but still nice love all the runaway games
